titleInfo.title: Barenaked Ladies at Bethel Woods Center for the Arts

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and split fountain, orange to red, on white) announcing the Barenaked Ladies with OMD and Howard Jones on the Last Summer on Earth Tour at the Bethel Woods Center for the Arts on June 17. Poster features a woodcut of Earth.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
